Fig. 2. Case studies of mementos of 1) a short term trip: “Toronto, Burlington, Montreal, and Ottawa – A quick spring jaunt through eastern Canada with a stopover in Vermont.”, 2) a walk in the park: “My walk in the English Garden – On 27/4/2014”, 3) multiple trips: “My trip to everything – I’m seeing the world”, 4) everyday life: “Few years in Ireland – Going through the years on the west of Ireland”, 5) boredom: “My trip to Nowhere – I did nothing”, and 6) a historic event: “Ben Jonson’s Walk to Scotland – in the summer of 1618”.
